name: Launch The Destroyers
description:
Drag in the opposite direction of the desired Destroyer movement to destroy as many CANNONS as you can until you Run out of your Jumps, Again and again, to defeat your Self while beating your HIGH SCORE. Some cannons can be destroyed from any direction but some have a great front defense. So, use your jumps carefully.

By the way, you can refile your jumps by hitting the Ground.
